stories.name: Join Us
stories.text: Join us to find a product mindset which helps you meet all your customers need. We'll make sure to provide you with the best experience.

stories.name: Leadership
stories.text: With unique skills needed to build a thriving drive for your business, we bring together idiosyncratic ways to make one look at their problems, train themselves to module customer-centric products and acquire leadership values.

stories.name: Google Us
stories.text: Just asked Chellam Sir about a recommendation for a perfect way to get my skills enhanced. And you know what did he say? To visit Aurask.

stories.name: Fathers Day
stories.text:
To the man who held your hand to teach how to walk, to the man who love you no matter what, to the man who will always have a place in your hearts.
Happy Father's Day to all the DADS Family.

stories.name: International Yoga Day
stories.text:
Yoga is Like Music. The Rhythm of the Body, The Melody of the Mind, and Harmony of the Soul Create the Symphony of Life. Happy International Yoga Day!
Wishing you a lifetime of health and goodness on the occasion of Yoga Day!
Keep meditating!

stories.name: Develop Skills
stories.text:
Aurask has developed various skills and training programs which will fulfill all the needs of professionals and will train you for future.
Join various programs by 'Aurask' to make yourself job ready

stories.name: Recommendation
stories.text: At AURASK we believe in excellency of people in their respective fields and enhancing their potential. With AURASK enjoy limitless learning of valuable skills and be the fittest person to survive in the world.

courses.name: Design Thinking
courses.overview: Come and learn problem solving even if you have no experience in technology. This course will help you build a strong base on the fundamentals of designing an architecture. Be the creator of new technologies with limits as far as your imagination goes! All beginners are welcome here!
courses.description: At Aurask we help you identify the core problems and build a mindset of ambiguity solving. We have personalized learning for the final year students, freshers and working professionals. You'll learn foundation skills while attaining niche technology learning of solving Business Process Management.

syllabus.title: Enterprise Design
content: Lego based bottoms up design pattern

syllabus.title: Process oriented mindset
content: Automated routing : Push and Pull Routing
Alternate ways to execute business process

syllabus.title: Release Management
content: Devops release pipeline : Continuous integration and Delivery

courses.name: Architecture Mindset
courses.description: This course will help you build a strong base on the fundamentals of designing long term architecture. Be the creator of new technologies with limits as far as your imagination goes! All beginners are welcome here!
courses.overview: Come and learn an abstract way of building technology solutions while utilizing the latest technology from digitisation and automation. You will establish the architecture thought process that covers customer-focused solutions and build components that can be reused.

syllabus.title: UX Design and Automated Processing
content: Design UX patterns to optimize performance

syllabus.title: Security Management
content: Roles and Access Groups and Security Mode

courses.name: Product Evolution
courses.description: Learn the art of working backwards from customers, Identifying the core business by the method of use cases, removing unwanted problems from today's business, we perform Decision making with the help of Data and providing value to our customers in a continuous manner. Created especially for working professionals who have long experience and managers to enhance their career goals.
courses.overview: Come and learn long term product building strategy even if you have no experience in business and technology. Here you will be learning all that there is to know about product management. All beginners are welcome here!

syllabus.title: Agile implementation
content: People skills focused on user Behaviour

courses.name: Leadership Journey
courses.description: Result Oriented leadership have always valued the take of an Entrepreneur on Understanding, Influencing shareholders, getting promotion from a manager to a leader and continuously creating innovative and useful products. It's built specifically for managers and entrepreneurs, to help them to reach to the next level of leadership or business.
courses.overview: Result Oriented leadership have always valued the take of an Entrepreneur on Understanding, Influencing shareholders, getting promotion from a manager to a leader and continuously creating innovative and useful products. It's built specifically for managers and entrepreneurs, to help them to reach to the next level of leadership or business.

syllabus.title: Continuous learning
content: Auditing Strategy - Weekly, Monthly and Quarterly review

syllabus.title: Thermostat leadership
content: Investment in technology then in people.

courses.name: Interview Ready - Engineers
courses.description: Come and learn problem solving even if you have no experience in technology. This course will help you build a strong base on the fundamentals of designing an architecture. Be the creator of new technologies with limits as far as your imagination goes! All beginners are welcome here!
courses.overview: This is a live interview-centric course in which the content has been designed in a manner that will prepare engineers for interviews for companies like Google, Amazon, Adobe, Uber, etc. Industry experts having first-hand experience will be mentoring and guiding you throughout the duration of the course.
